title: Monitoring - Server Room Temperature Alert
description: An RMM alert indicates the temperature in a client's server room has exceeded the safe threshold.

tasks.description: Immediately contact the client's emergency on-site contact to inform them of the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is notified of the urgent situation.

tasks.description: Ask the on-site contact to check the status of the air conditioning (AC) unit in the server room.
tasks.expected_outcome: The on-site contact reports the AC unit has failed. The technician advises the client to contact an HVAC repair company and to begin a graceful shutdown of servers if the temperature continues to rise.
